articles.title: Juventus banned from European football next season - Euronews
articles.description: The Italian club has been accused of false accounting, which allegedly increased its capital by 700 million euros.
articles.content:
The Italian club has been accused of false accounting, which allegedly increased its capital by 700 million euros.
 Italian football team FC Juventus will to challenge the UEFA's decision to remove … [+1215 chars]
